"Adila": "It's always nice to meet new people! Let's all kick butt out there!"
"You're that new arrival Bruder mentioned! I've heard all about you! You're learning about how to get the edge in battle, right?"

"Let's see...
Do you know about adding Special Abilities to your equipment?"
"If you don't, I'll be happy to explain it to you!"
"Basically, Special Abilities are little bonuses that tweak the performance of your weapons and armor."
"Next time you've got your equipment data in front of you, take a careful look at it."
"So... You can put multiple Special Abilities on the same piece of equipment, and even swap them out for different ones."
"You can add Special Abilities down at the Item Lab. But you'll need \"Special Ability Capsules\" if you want to try it yourself..."
"I'll give you some of my Special Ability Capsules! Take them down to the Lab and try them out!"
"No? Well if you ever want to hear it, I'll be right here!"
